    question => string (479) "<p>Many entities provide their clients and potential clients promotional and...
    $value[15]['question']
    <p>Many entities provide their clients and potential clients promotional and advertising material without charge.  This might include:-</p>
<ul>
    <li>Brochures and catalogues;</li>
    <li>Samples;</li>
    <li>Information sheets;</li>
    <li>Logo merchandising, pens, mouse mats etc.</li>
</ul>
<p>Ensure that these items are expensed unless they are deemed to have a net realisable value (in which case, should be valued in accordance with 15 above).  <b>(V)</b></p>
